column2: A tax on the wealthiest Americans has the potential to become a tax on the rest of the population, writes Thomas Hoenig.
column4: A New Wealth Tax Would Target Billionaires. The Middle Class Should Worry, Too.

column2: Is Amazon stock a buy now that it announced a 20-for-1 stock split, its first in more than 20 years, along with a $10 billion stock buyback plan?
column4: Is Amazon Stock A Buy Now That It Plans A 20-For-1 Split And Buyback?
